summary: Every time I've setup a server in the past decade the SSH keys have been set for me, most hosts I've used do this (DigitalOcean, Hetzner, etc).  This week I signed up for a server with Contabo and I had to do it myself, like a caveman.  Lewis was kind enough to help because he'd done the same thing mere days before me...
title: Copy SSH Keys to a Server

summary:
A new song by Paul Weller popped up as a recommendation.  It's called "Change What You Can" and the chorus goes:

And change what I can
And I'll make the difference I can
And I'll show all else out
All that is worthless
And I'll aim to change what I can

It's a fantastic ability we humans have—if there's something we're not happy with, we can change the situation.  We don't like a song, so we skip to the next one...
title: Change or Accept

summary: What life is like on the day before and the day of an ultramarathon 24-hour race for the racer and her one-man crew
title: Being Wonder Woman's Husband
